chunk.name: Prompts Router
chunk.summary: This chunk specifies the Prompts tRPC router for `/prompts` page, enabling CRUD operations, likes, and search with tRPC, Zod, and Drizzle-ORM. It targets the `prompts` and `prompt_likes` tables, optimized for performance. (Verified with Context7 MCP.)

ambiguities.item: Unclear if prompt search includes tag filtering.

clarifications.question: Should `prompts.title` use full-text indexing for search?
Does search include tag-based filtering?
Assume batch embedding generation for prompts?
